title: Coding in R {intro}
description: An introduction to developing in R
contents:
Getting Started
First things first, lets take care of a few housekeeping items (like getting you up and running).
Recommended setup:
Install R, RStudio, Tidyverse: link
Install Rtools (windows): link
Install Devtools: link
To check that your environment is properly setup, run:


devtools::has_devel()
#> Your system is ready to build packages!
